Test Name: DICER1 Mutation Analysis, Next-Generation Sequencing (NGS), Tumor
Purpose: To detect DICER1 gene mutations in tumor specimens using NGS, ensuring accurate, valid, and reproducible results.
Container: Formalin-fixed paraffin-embedded (FFPE) tissue block or fresh-frozen tissue vial
Equipment: Microtome, DNA extraction system (e.g., QIAcube), Qubit or NanoDrop spectrophotometer, PCR thermocycler, Illumina NGS sequencer, Bioanalyzer or TapeStation
